name: Santa's Gifts
description:
Ho, ho, ho! It feels better that the winter holidays are approaching. Have you been dutiful this year?

The Santa's Gifts is a casual game aims to create a festive atmosphere for each of us. But there is a problem! The gifts were stuck in the ice.

Are you ready to help Santa? Clear his way so that he can make all children happy this year too, besides, what else is magic for? It's not so hard, just put your brain on and help Santa! Merry Christmas everyone!

Game Features :
- 15 levels
- Christmas atmosphere
- Blocked gifts
- The difficulty increase in every new level
